name: 陳靜儀
objective:
本課程旨在為有志於成為 UX 設計師的學生提供全面而實用的學習體驗。學生將深入了解 UX 設計的理論基礎，掌握實用技能，並獲得寶貴的實踐經驗。學生將透過完成一個綜合性專案來展示他們的學習成果。這個課程將涵蓋從使用者研究研究到最終設計的整個 UX 設計流程。

學生將學習：
1. 理解 UX 設計師的角色、職責及其在產品開發中的重要性
2. 掌握使用者研究研究、資訊架構、原型設計等核心 UX 設計技能
3. 運用設計思考方法解決複雜的使用者研究體驗問題
4. 熟練使用行業標準的 UX 設計工具和技術
5. 理解並應用 UX 設計的最佳實踐和設計模式
6. 策劃和執行有效的可用性測試，並基於結果進行設計迭代
7. 了解 UX 設計在敏捷開發環境中的應用
8. 探索生成式 AI 在 UX 設計中的應用及未來趨勢

---
This course is designed to provide a comprehensive and practical learning experience for students aspiring to become UX designers. Students will gain an in-depth understanding of the theoretical foundations of UX design, acquire practical skills, and gain valuable practical experience. Students will demonstrate their learning by completing a comprehensive project. This project will cover the entire UX design process from user research research to final design, providing students with a practical case that can be incorporated into their professional portfolio.

Students will learn:
1. Understand the role, responsibilities and importance of UX designers in product development
2. Master core UX design skills such as user research, information architecture, and prototype design
3. Use design thinking methods to solve complex user research experience problems
4. Proficient in using industry-standard UX design tools and techniques
5. Understand and apply UX design best practices and design patterns
6. Plan and execute effective usability testing and conduct design iterations based on the results
7. Understand the application of UX design in agile development environments
8. Explore the application and future trends of generative AI in UX design
